name: Abdul Baseer Qazi
summary: Abdul Baseer Qazi is a highly accomplished professional with extensive experience in technology policy, engineering management, and software engineering. With a PhD in Technology Policy and expertise in MERN Stack development, Node.js, and Python, Abdul has consistently delivered impactful solutions and successfully led teams in similar roles. His exceptional leadership qualities, strategic thinking, and visionary capabilities have resulted in significant achievements throughout his career. Notably, Abdul has excelled as a Senior Associate Professor and Career Services Counselor, where he played a crucial role in guiding and mentoring students. Additionally, he served as an Affiliated Researcher in Technical Change and ICT Policy, contributing valuable insights to the field. Abdul's unique combination of skills and accomplishments enable him to provide outstanding services and value to potential clients or employers. With a track record of success and a passion for innovation, Abdul is ideally suited for the role of Jr. MERN Stack Developer-3 Node Js Dev Python Dv.
